name: Catfishing
description: A script focused on information manipulation and false identities. Characters often receive wrong information or appear to be something they're not.
author: Community Created
specialRules: Multiple ways to receive false information
Baron ensures extra Outsiders for confusion
setupNotes: Classic Trouble Brewing characters with emphasis on information roles that can be manipulated.
howToRun: Identity misdirection theme. Clarify timing on character identity effects. Keep a log of claims vs. ability results to spot reveals/conflicts.

firstNight.description: Wake all Minions together. Show them who the other Minions are and who the Demon is
Wake the Demon. Show them who their Minions are. Give them 3 character tokens as bluffs

tipsAndTricks: Good: Track who claimed what, when. Test for contradictions via hard-check roles. Evil: Impersonate low-info roles and pivot identities on schedule.
bluffing: Change claims sparingly with a reason (drunk/poison/morph), not randomly.

modifiers.note: Soldier and Saint provide overlapping survival abilities.
Mayor and Saint both provide execution protection.
Recluse benefits from characters that can detect or confirm alignment changes.
Baron adds 2 Outsiders and removes 2 Townsfolk.
